title: After the Choice

War veterans: Recognize war was unnecessary, referendum should have come first
Guild operators: Shutdown is effectively permanent despite theoretical reversibility
5 colonies request delayed compliance (8 months instead of 6)

chapter_purpose: Show aftermath of referendum, demonstrate gracious acceptance from both sides, humanize the coming loss, transition from political to personal
